TopicTitle: Vehicle loss on timewarp exit and then Warp Kraken in full power

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win10 | CPU: i7-10700K | GPU: RTX2060 | RAM: 32GB

 

I am not joking, see the video.

So I was trying to fly to Eeloo (save and craft file attached) with Fly Safe-4. Performed a transfer in timewarp, stopped, got a bunch of errors, but the time itself broke. Fiddled with the time tool, all of a sudden the craft got yoten into Kerbin's core and destroyed. Also experienced the highest g-force I've ever seen. Right after the camera started moving away from no-longer-existing Kerbin, and, in fact, the rest of the solar system. At 10 times the speed of light. Kerbol, or its remnant after a supernova, was a huge ball of light somewhere in space, all in map mode. Switched to flight view, and it was veery far away, soon to disappear. Then I sped up the time. The very fabric of the universe started shaking and ripping like if it was attacked by eternal creature, felt like entering a singularity.

All of that, including the game log from the event, is attached. Just after I completely lost sight of the universe, I switched to the tracking station but it never loaded, nor the esc menu managed to appear on the loading screen. I F9'd to previous save though, it all looked good.
